title: Sealfie App

meta.description: Protect your business from deepfake fraud. Sealfie simplifies cybersecurity – it's the only digital companion that effectively fights fake executive scams.

descriptions.homepage: Stop executive deepfake fraud with Sealfie. Advanced biometric protection against CEO impersonation. One-photo verification prevents $5B losses. Try demo.
descriptions.documentation: Learn how Sealfie works: Step-by-step guide to preventing executive fraud with biometric verification. 30-minute setup, zero training required.
descriptions.pricing: Sealfie pricing: Executive fraud protection starting at $195/person/year. Compare plans, features, enterprise solutions. Get quote.
descriptions.terms: Sealfie Terms of Service: Legal terms for executive fraud protection. Subscription terms, refunds, and user responsibilities explained.
descriptions.privacy: Sealfie Privacy Policy: How we protect your biometric data and personal information. GDPR compliant privacy practices for security.
descriptions.support: Sealfie Customer Support: Get help with executive fraud protection setup, troubleshooting, technical assistance. Contact security experts 24/7.
descriptions.post_register: Registration Confirmed: Welcome to Sealfie executive fraud protection. Next steps for account setup and biometric verification activation.

title.line2: Protect it with a simple selfie

hero.subtitle: Business Email Compromise costs enterprises $5 billion annually. No industry is safe from sophisticated deepfake attacks.

example.title: Real Case:
example.text: A Hong Kong firm lost $25M when criminals created 6 deepfakes of colleagues, including their CFO, in a video conference call. Cyber training didn't protect them.

cta.primary: Challenge your current process with us

head.title: Stop Losing to Deepfakes!
head.subtitle: Executive fraud attacks are now undetectable. Sealfie dramatically simplifies the defense – just one photo.
head.subtitle2: We handle the complex technical verifications.  Forget endless MFA training and alerts.

testimonial: Sealfie: Unmatched security meets effortless implementation, powered by Inkan.link’s cutting-edge attestation technology.
centeredmsg: Protect your organization with the simplest security solution.
trailer: Executive email compromise: 5 billion stolen per year!

post_register.title: Post-Registration Confirmation
post_register.main: Thank you for your interest.  We’ll be in touch within 24 hours to discuss your specific needs.
post_register.custom: We’re also available to develop customized solutions tailored to your organization’s requirements.

person.title: Simple & Effective
person.text: Just like taking a photo, Sealfie automatically handles all technical verifications for you. No training required.

send.title: Unparalleled Security
send.text: Each transaction is securely verified instantly. We create a bundle of irrefutable digital evidence – far more reliable than traditional MFA.

shield.title: Adaptable & Scalable
shield.text: Sealfie integrates seamlessly with your existing processes.  Contact us to discuss your customized integration and expand verification sources.

path.title: Automation & Audit Trail
path.text: Sealfie automates verifications and preserves a complete audit trail for every transaction, ensuring complete traceability and compliance.

users.title: Streamlined Security
users.text: Reduce the complexity of security without compromising protection. Starting at $195/person/year.

cost.title: Pricing
cost.text: Includes standard validation and up to 20 validations per year.  Custom quotes available for tailored integrations, increased validation volumes, and priority support.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.text: Full support included – no IT integration required.  We adapt to your processes and systems upon request.

period.title: Subscription Terms
period.text: Annual subscription, cancellable at any time. Larger enterprises and bespoke requirements require a consultation.

onboard.title: Quick Deployment
onboard.text: You’ll be operational within 30 minutes – minimal system integration ensures immediate protection during an attack.

techno.title: Advanced Technology
techno.text: We dynamically perform multi-source technical verifications in real-time. Expanding verification sources is simple and seamless.

description.title: Revolutionize Your Cybersecurity
description.text: Faced with increasingly sophisticated deepfakes and identity theft, traditional cybersecurity is exhausting: endless training, constant alerts, and complex MFA.
description.text2: Sealfie radically changes the equation – just one simple process instead of knowing ALL possible attacks. A selfie for you, we handle the technical complexities and produce a list of attestations more reliable than traditional MFA processes.
description.text3: We coordinate technical information sources behind the scenes while your teams enjoy an experience as smooth as taking a photo. Thanks to our deeptech technology, we’ll adapt to threats without making usage more complex.

action.stop: Criminals have automated and improved their attacks.
action.start: Be proactive – continuous red alert is counterproductive.

contactus.main: Protect your organization and receive a personalized demo in 30 minutes.
contactus.custom: We also offer to develop customized solutions tailored to your organization’s requirements.

appstore.download: Sealfie is available on app stores

mail.title: Email
mail.error: Please enter a valid email address

phone.title: Phone Number
phone.error: Please enter a valid phone number

phonetype.title: Type of Phone Used
phonetype.error: Please enter a valid email address

support: Please send us an email with your phone number to help us identify the issue more quickly.

docs.title: Sealfie: How does it work?
docs.subtitle: Upon registration, after contacting us, the system will be operational within 30 minutes.

stepstart.two: Take a selfie with a neutral expression.
stepstart.tree: Add a short message to the selfie (optional).
stepstart.biometric: Confirm your identity using your smartphone's biometric authentication.

docs.intersteps: The request is processed and additional validations, such as checking for changes in your phone subscription, are performed automatically.

stepvalidate.two: They verify the selfie and the consistency of information.
stepvalidate.tree: Each user adds their own selfie.
stepvalidate.biometric: Each user confirms their identity using their smartphone's biometric authentication.

docs.completed: The requester is guaranteed that only authorized individuals have approved the request. Contact us for customized solutions.
